txt.en: 'Greetings! I am Rusgwen, maker of fine barrels and crates. If you are looking for work, I am in need of someone to collect wood outside the city's walls. Fear not, for I shan't ask you to chop it yourself. I did that already yesterday and left it there to dry a bit.\n\n'No sense in my lugging it back up the hill when I can pay coin to have some dolt â€“ uh, that is, some fine individual to gather it for me.'
You should bring the cut wood you gathered back to Rusgwen in Calembel.
'Welcome back! Huh, you found far more wood than I expected. My apologies for underestimating you!'
A maker of barrels in Calembel needs help gathering chopped wood from the surrounding forests.
Rusgwen has asked you to gather cut wood from the tree dotted areas around Calembel.
